details.callToWorship: Tis So Sweet to Trust in Jesus #411
details.fellowshipSong: We Have Heard the Joyful Sound #581

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: October is Pastor Appreciation month! We have a box in the foyer for thank-you cards, gift cards, etc., for Pastor Ken. Drop in your cards/gifts today!
The treat giveaway is Thursday from 5:00-7:00 PM in front of Subway. Please donate candy and help pass it out; sign up in the foyer.
Homecoming is Sunday, November 10. Allen Roberts will preach with a fellowship meal to follow.
